GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its id

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all the comments of an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article

exampleRequest.body: Does look like Mitch! Maybe Mitch is an immortal vampire, living among us from ages old ~

comment.body: Does look like Mitch! Maybe Mitch is an immortal vampire, living among us from ages old ~
comment.author: lurker

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: updates an article by article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its id
